title: Bot lane duo LFT plat+
body:
Hi,
Me and my friend are looking to play duo bot in a team for ranked 5s and getting ready for the new season. I am plat 2 (ADC) and he is plat 5 (support). We can play champs that can adapt to the team comp if needed. We both have access to skype and teamspeak and have our own server if needed.

My IGN: Big KRIT
